user-team.leave-team-last-member-subtitle: You currently are the last member of this team. Unfortunately, this means you can't leave the team until you add another member.
user-team.assign-member-description: Choose another team member you trust and grant them rights. This will allow you to leave the team while ensuring someone remains to manage it.
user-team.delete-org-description: If the organization is no longer needed, you can choose to delete it entirely.
user-team.leave-team-subtitle: Are you sure you want to leave {{name}}?
